motions.title: Motion to Adjourn
motions.description: Motion to adjourn the special called meeting after first public hearing on 2025 millage rate of 3.040 mills.

publicHearings.title: Public Hearing for Establishing 2025 Millage Rate
publicHearings.description: First of three required public hearings for proposed 2025 millage rate of 3.040 mills, same as previous year. One speaker opposed (Bob Hickey questioning language and meeting time), none in favor.
publicHearings.recommendation: Staff recommends adoption of rate of 3.040 mills at June 30 public hearing
